scripts.prestart: yarn run build && yarn run symlink
scripts.build-core: cd projects/core && yarn install && cd .. && ng build --configuration production core
scripts.build-substrate-rpc: cd projects/substrate-rpc && yarn install && cd .. && ng build --configuration production substrate-rpc
scripts.build-polkascan: cd projects/polkascan && yarn install && cd .. && ng build --configuration production polkascan
scripts.watch: ng build core --configuration development && concurrently "ng build substrate-rpc --watch --configuration development" "ng build polkascan --watch --configuration development" "sleep 20 && ng build core --watch --configuration development"
